author: alex.pipo
title: IRONSKY PlaytoEarn Milestone of ADA
description: El ecosistema de Cardano tiene pocos juegos NFT, no mantiene la tendencia del Metaverso y perderá su competitividad con otros ecosistemas de criptomonedas.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal effectively addresses the challenge and targets to introduce PlayToEarn game that will increase Cardano's footprint in metaverse. 

Lately there is a huge surge in metaverse projects and this is about time that Cardano ups its game too. Hence this challenge. The proposal has come up with an entertaining gaming idea with good business model and the detailed game phases  are very simple to understand, and has a good story line attached to it.

The game mechanics are further well explained that How play to earn will work for this game, and integrating NFT items is just about how any play to earn games are attracting more and more gamers.
f6_assessments.q1:
The experience of the proposal team is very good and in sync with the implementation domain of the proposed idea. All the team members details are presented (with linked in profiles) and additionally the pictures and details can also be found on the game website.

The game website is already updated with latest updates and contact information, and being a senior developer myself I can confirm that team experience is very good to achieve implementation of this proposal.

The budget allocation is done hourly basis and this makes it easier to justify the overall budget that is asked for. Each hourly rate is associated with the subdomain of this proposal e.g. art, design, development, animation etc.

The plan is very well outlined,  quarterly distribution of feature sets is point wise given. This is very easy to map to where proposer wants to take proposal in 3-6-9 months.

Therefore, i fully agree that plan and experience presented makes it highly likely that this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
I like it very much that a separate section on audit-ability is given. Furthermore, this section is divided with where additional catalyst funding resources will be used for.

This clarifies a well thought out plan and community can be sure that the budget is well spent. This also gives an opportunity to the community that this project can be tracked well across different stages of this proposal implementation.

The risks associate with this proposal are also given in details, which most of the proposals forget or miss out on. This makes community well aware of what can be expected (if something does not happen as per timelines given). The team also has given good section as solution to the risks associated, and furthermore added good section of KPIs, that are giving a good impression on how the success of this proposal will be measured. This is very well written proposal, that covers all the aspects of challenge settings. Therefore, i am very confident that this proposal can be audited easily for both progress and success.

f6_assessments.q0:
After a lot of boring card games and turn-based games, this is the first game that I think is different. This game genre is simple-to-play but can be like a whirlpool that players can't escape when start to play with it. Therefore, it will make a migration of players to Cardano ecosystem to play it. 
In addition, the outlined key metrics show that the team is concerned about the challenge given so much and tries to add a lot of value to Cardano ecosystem, not just only with the number of players to play the game but also increase ADA holders by this game.
f6_assessments.q1:
Their budget breakdown is very detailed and reasonable with their development roadmap that is detailed to single parts of the implementation of the game. 
They also have a good explanation about gameplay with environments and game story that will strongly inspire players, and that info can help Cardano community assess their timeline easily. Moreover, they are also aware of some risks that can affect their progress, so I think the info in this proposal is enough to prove that they have the feasibility to finish the project.
f6_assessments.q2:
The team has a very detailed roadmap, with a realistic timeline and a reasonable budget for implementing the project in the scope of this proposal. All of them go with their suggested key metric of success I think it is completely enough for auditability. 
Go through the explanation about the problem and the game detail that I believe it can effectively solve that problem, I hope that the successful launching of this game will make a new wind to the blockchain game industry

f6_assessments.q0:
It is amazing beyond my imagination with this project IRONSKY PlaytoEarn Milestone of ADA. I never thought that in the Cardano ecosystem, there is such an attractive Play to Earn game proposal. Surely it will be an attractive game for gamers in the near future, which increases the value of Cardano as well as the entertainment value it brings to the Catalyst community. 
In addition, the author also included the product code of the game in the form of NFT as well as divided the parts of the project quite clearly. 
It is also important that the integration of Metaverse integrated into the last parts of the project will be really attractive. 
When I visited the website wwww.ironsky.info I was really surprised, it was really interesting and I became interested in this proposal more specifically.
f6_assessments.q1:
As a community advisor, I've come across a lot of recommendations from Catalyst but when I came across this IRONSKY recommendation, it made me pause for a longer read. Did something happen?
- A great game scenario with great expansion later as well as the long history of this game.
- Graphics are sharp, attractive to gamers
- The project team has a very clear identity, with in-depth experience in the game industry on Mobile & PC, has had certain successes.
- Mechanisms in the game are clear, from items, NFTs to tokens are mentioned.
Please perfect the scenario it is the fascinating part that is attracting me.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal has a very detailed roadmap, it impressed me, the author clearly knows the steps to do in his game project. 
In addition, the risk analysis from the crypto market to the difficulties of the product is clearly stated. As well as upcoming success indicators and KPIs.
The budget transparency is also very detailed, making it easy for those who vote for this project to choose.
I look forward to using the Test version of the IRONSKY game as well as owning the first special NFTs of the game. Good luck.
